languages.text: "Да простит Азуриан детей своих". {n}Шайрэнкхей вздыхает и подает сигнал нескольким воинам неподалеку.{/n} "Отправляйтесь за провидцами. Передайте им... Изгой желает провести ритуал. Мы будем ждать их здесь".

"May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."
languages.original_text: "Да простит Азуриан детей своих". {n}Шайрэнкхей вздыхает и подает сигнал нескольким воинам неподалеку.{/n} "Отправляйтесь за провидцами. Передайте им... Изгой желает провести ритуал. Мы будем ждать их здесь".

traits.locale_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the seers. Tell them... the Exile wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Que Asuryan perdone a sus hijos». {n}Shairenkhei suspira y hace un gesto a algunos de sus guerreros.{/n} «Traed a los videntes. Decidles... que la proscrita desea celebrar el ritual. Les esperaremos aquí».
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: «Que Asuryan perdone a sus hijos». {n}Shairenkhei suspira y hace un gesto a algunos de sus guerreros.{/n} «Traed a los videntes. Decidles... que la proscrita desea celebrar el ritual. Les esperaremos aquí».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “愿阿苏焉宽恕他的子嗣。”{n}榭伦凯叹了口气，朝他的战士做了个手势。{/n}“去找先知。告诉他们……流浪者打算举行仪式，我们在这里等他们。”
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: “愿阿苏焉宽恕他的子嗣。”{n}榭伦凯叹了口气，朝他的战士做了个手势。{/n}“去找先知。告诉他们……流浪者打算举行仪式，我们在这里等他们。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Puisse Asuryan pardonner à ses enfants. » {n}Shairenkhei soupire et fait signe à quelques-uns de ses guerriers.{/n} « Allez chercher les Grands Prophètes. Dites-leur que... l'Errante souhaite accomplir le rituel. Nous les attendrons ici. »
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse Asuryan pardonner à ses enfants. » {n}Shairenkhei soupire et fait signe à quelques-uns de ses guerriers.{/n} « Allez chercher les prophètes. Dites-leur que... l'Errante souhaite accomplir le rituel. Nous les attendrons ici. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「アシュリアンが御子らを許さんことを」{n}シャイレンケイは、ため息をつき、数人の戦士にジェスチャーをした。{/n}「予見者を連れてこい。彼らに…追放者が儀式を行いたいと伝えてくれ。我々は、ここで待つ」
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンが御子らを許さんことを」{n}シャイレンケイは、ため息をつき、数人の戦士にジェスチャーをした。{/n}「予見者を連れてこい。彼らに…追放者が儀式を行いたいと伝えてくれ。我々は、ここで待つ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Möge Asuryan seinen Kindern vergeben." {n}Shairenkhei seufzt und gibt einigen seiner Krieger ein Zeichen.{/n} "Holt die Runenpropheten. Sagt ihnen ... die Ausgestoßene will das Ritual ausführen. Wir warten hier auf sie."
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: "Möge Asuryan seinen Kindern vergeben." {n}Shairenkhei seufzt und gibt einigen seiner Krieger ein Zeichen.{/n} "Holt die Seher. Sagt ihnen ... die Ausgestoßene will das Ritual ausführen. Wir warten hier auf sie."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Asuryan, çocuklarını affetsin." {n}Shairenkhei, iç çekerek birkaç savaşçısına işaret ediyor.{/n} "Ötesezenleri getirin. Onlara... Yurtsuz'un ayini gerçekleştirmeyi arzuladığını söyleyin. Onları burada bekleyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan forgive his children." {n}Shairenkhei sighs and gestures to a few of his warriors.{/n} "Fetch the Farseers. Tell them... the Outcast wishes to perform the ritual. We will wait for them here."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan çocuklarını affetsin." {n}Shairenkhei, iç çekerek birkaç savaşçısına işaret ediyor.{/n} "Ötesezenleri getirin. Onlara... Yurtsuz'un ayini gerçekleştirmeyi arzuladığını söyleyin. Onları burada bekleyeceğiz."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
